i love to put a smile on peoples faces.
i love pizza.

my eyes are brown.

participant_2.background:
I'd love to have lunch with my grandparents and catch up on what's been happening in their lives.
my favorite animals are dolphins.
I am comfortable with the weather, and enjoy spending time outdoors.
I am a caring individual who wants to help others, but I am afraid that I will not be able to live up to my own expectations.
I'm going to work on a new piece for my portfolio.

content.text: I'm doing well. Just hanging out and enjoying the day. How about you?
I'm doing well too. I'm about to go work on a new piece for my portfolio.
That sounds exciting! What kind of work do you do?
I'm an artist. I work in a variety of mediums, but my favorite is painting.
That's awesome! I love art. I used to play guitar, but I haven't in a while.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to learn to play an instrument.
It's a lot of fun. It's also a great way to relieve stress.
I can imagine. I love listening to music. It always puts me in a good mood.
Me too! I love all kinds of music. What's your favorite genre?
I like a little bit of everything, but I'm really into indie rock right now.
I've never really listened to indie rock before. What are some good bands?
There are so many great indie rock bands out there. Some of my favorites are The Strokes, The Shins, and The National.
I'll have to check them out. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about music.
